titles.title: A bill to establish the Route 66 Centennial Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Barrasso without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 117.

action.text: By Senator Barrasso from Committee on Environment and Public Works filed written report. Report No. 116-62.

bill.summary:
Route 66 Centennial Commission Act
This bill establishes the Route 66 Centennial Commission to honor U.S. Route 66 on the occasion of its centennial anniversary.
The bill sets forth the duties of the commission, its membership, powers, and reporting requirements.
The commission shall terminate not later than June 30, 2027.
